Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Gegee
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a simple, easy to use and that has the android apps on it, this is the phone.  I bought this phone for my husband and he is no electronic wiz, but for some reason he has figured out this phone like no other, LOL  I have also played with it and I am contemplating on getting one for me!

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: turbobirdo
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice, high quality phone. It is not the newest thing around, but is good enough for everyday use. The camera loads a little slow, but it takes great pictures and the videos record very well. One thing I did not like is that I cannot load photos directly to Facebook. I have to download them to my pc via usb cable first. Also, this works perfectly with Page Plus cellular services, so I am able to pay only $12 dollars a month for  cell service. Overall, if you want a phone for texting and talking and light internet usage such as Facebook and email, this is a great phone. If you are a heavy internet user and like to play a lot of online games, you may want something else. For me, this is almost perfect.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: tracie
Reviews.Content: I love this item first droid I've owned and its great.the shipping was quick and the company even contacted me when there was a problem with my address.would buy from this seller again.and I'm actually getting 2 more of these phones for my kids.

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Sylvia
Reviews.Content: Is so easy to use and the battery last long at least for me, don't laggreat buy! great price!

Reviews.Title: Good cell and all it features
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: yes love this phone it is really does what it say .  I would tell my friends where I got it from

Reviews.Title: Great deal for a used smart phone.
Reviews.Author: Steve W.
Reviews.Content: I bought this Droid A855 to replace a Pantech Crux non-smart (dumb?) phone. Since it's my first smart phone, I can't compare it to anything more modern. However, it has a working browser, Google search and maps, navigation, calendar, 5 MP camera, can be tethered to my laptop with PDANet, and does everything I need, all on Page Plus Cellular. This phone runs Android 2.2.3, so it's not going to astound anybody with the latest bells and whistles, but it works just fine. The touch screen keyboard works just fine, so I hardly ever pull out the physical keyboard, but it's there if I want to, and it works, too. I would recommend this phone to anybody who wants web and nav, but doesn't need a lot of fancy stuff.

Reviews.Title: Not too bad
Reviews.Author: R. Rahuba
Reviews.Content: It works, that is the good thing.  No sim card included therefore we are unable to use this phone to take pictures.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Drew B.
Reviews.Content: The phone came with a little bit of difficulties. Which the phone wouldn't unlock sometimes after a call. It got annoying but other than that the phone works great

Reviews.Title: Phone is junk
Reviews.Author: Veronica Laster
Reviews.Content: Phone freezes, crashes and over half the time screen will not respond to touch command or dial Worst purchase ever.

Reviews.Title: 2 Motorola Driod A855 Touchscreen Querty phones
Reviews.Author: Mark Randles
Reviews.Content: One phone was in very good condition but the second one was very worn and scratched which I did like being sent for the same price as the first phone.  We are using Page Plus but keep getting a recording from Verizon saying we have less than $2 remaining on the phone that repeats every time I want to use the phone.  It takes some getting use to, to use this touch screen phone verses my old phone.

Reviews.Title: phones did not work.
Reviews.Author: Kirk Kendrick
Reviews.Content: first phone did not work and neither did the second replacement phone. cheapcellphonereplacement claims that all phones are inspected for defects. Apparently that is not true. When I have time I must return both phones at my expense for a refund.  Rating Unsatisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, great service
Reviews.Author: Stewart Steen
Reviews.Content: I had a used version of this that I got for Page Plus, and it finally gave up the ghost.  I ordered a new one from Battery Assault.  Arrived in perfect condition, three days earlier than Amazon had predicted.  Highly recommend both this phone and Battery Assault.

Reviews.Title: chilimac357
Reviews.Author: chilimac357
Reviews.Content: this phone has aweak signal,sometimes it show all four bars and as soon as you make a call it will go to one bar or noneit drops calls and poor receptioni live about 2 mile from a tower and even sitting at tower it have poor receptionMotorola Droid A855 CDMA (Black) QWERTY Android Touch-Screen Smart Phone

Reviews.Title: Phone is a piece of ****
Reviews.Author: J. Danczyk "Shasta"
Reviews.Content: First off, customer service was very good.The phone however, really ...well sucked!  It started out fine for about 2 weeks, then I lost control of answering calls, dialing out, the screen refused to respond half the time, things like internet browsing or google maps were just not possible.  I am not a heavy phone user, talk/text/data i don't use much of it, I took good care of it but in the end it was just to much to overlook.  They offered me a refund or a replacement.  I took the refund.  Again, the seller was good, but the phone was not.

Reviews.Title: Quit working in about a month
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: I initially like the phone, the camera was nice, and it was a quick phone. The battery wasn't all that great. My big problem with it was the charging port gave out on me in just a little over a month of having it. After paying $50 to have that fixed it broke again in about a week. Not worth the hassle.

Reviews.Title: phone will not keep a charge
Reviews.Author: Fre
Reviews.Content: I've only had this phone a few months and it will not keep a charge...i am out of a $100  plus $ because now i need to purchase a new phone.

Reviews.Title: free everything!
Reviews.Author: Daniel H.
Reviews.Content: you can just use wifi and bluetooth in your car and pretty much run off of that. free music downloader ;-)
